name: Rannamaari
description:
Welcome to the first visual novel I have created. This story is based upon the mythological story of Maldives, about a sea spirit called Rannamaari who terrorized the country of Maldives. It mains a Moroccan traveler called Abu Barakath Yusuf-ul Barbari, who came to Maldives to trade. However, he was pulled into the affairs of the country and you take control of Abu Barakath and try to save the day!

This is also my FYP for my Multimedia Technology Degree I made for Asia Pacific University of Technology and Innovation.
